entry.string: Polls is a Xaraya Content Module.
entry.translation: Pulls is a Xereya Cuntent Mudoole-a.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: The Polls Module controls the configuration and management of simple vote questions.
entry.translation: Zee Pulls Mudoole-a cuntruls zee cunffeegooreshun und munegement ooff seemple-a fute-a qooesshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: From the menu, you have four choices.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a fuoor chueeces.

entry.string: Add a Poll to your site
entry.translation: Edd a Pull tu yuoor seete

entry.string: View a summary list of existing Polls
entry.translation: Feeoo a soommery leest ooff ixeesting Pulls

entry.string: Poll blocks will display the current poll in block format.
entry.translation: Pull blucks veell deespley zee coorrent pull in bluck furmet. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: display -- Allows you to display a poll for a particular module item (e.g. an article, xarbb topic, ...)
entry.translation: deespley -- Elloos yuoo tu deespley a pull fur a perteecooler mudoole-a item (i.g. un erteecle-a, xerbb tupeec, ...)

entry.string: new/create/modify/update/delete -- Allows you to create/update a poll for a particular module item
entry.translation: noo/creete-a/mudeeffy/updete-a/delete-a -- Elloos yuoo tu creete-a/updete-a a pull fur a perteecooler mudoole-a item
